page.title: 15HOBBIES/LEISURE-WASHINGTON
page.content: The following improvements to hobbies and leisure activities were suggested by the 197 people interviewed by the pupils of Usworth Grange Primary Sch. {knitting-}youth groups,more wool shops,classes and knitting circles. {reading-}more areas for children, improved library service. {walking-}more parks,paths,grassed areas.{football-}more grounds,organise games.{small ball games-}more courts . {sewing-}classes, more choice. {swimming-}nearer,cleaner,bigger pools, no chlorine,jacuzzis and sauners. {bowls-}indoor bowling green. {darts-}more clubs.{keep fit/yoga-}more classes,better facilities. {bingo-}more halls.{golf-}reduce cost. {gardening-}improve waste land,more garden centres. {dog training-}more centres.
